holidays.title: Archery Day
holidays.description: Draw your bows and prepare to celebrate the most iconic weapon of the ancient era.

holidays.title: Birth Mother’s Day
holidays.description: Even if Hallmark does not traditionally acknowledge this special group of women, we certainly do!

holidays.title: Brunch for Lunch Day
holidays.description: Today on Brunch for Lunch day, take a break and go brunching with your friends.

holidays.title: Cornelia De Lange Syndrome Awareness Day
holidays.description: We get to help create awareness about this rare but very real condition.

holidays.title: Dog Mom Day
holidays.description: Get ready to celebrate being a mom to your cute pups this Dog Mom Day.

holidays.title: Guernsey Liberation Day
holidays.description: Get ready to revise important facts about the world's history while we celebrate liberation.

holidays.title: Hurray for Buttons Day
holidays.description: Buttons often go unappreciated, so celebrate the small, functional article, and show gratitude for its existence.

holidays.title: Lost Sock Memorial Day
holidays.description: We honor all the socks that are no longer with us. Where did they go?

holidays.title: Martin Z. Mollusk Day
holidays.description: Help Martin Z. Mollusk bring us an early summer by celebrating his day!

holidays.title: National Babysitter Day
holidays.description: Celebrate the ones who look after those dearest to you — your children.

holidays.title: National Butterscotch Brownie Day
holidays.description: Indulge your sweet tooth in as much buttery goodness as possible on National Butterscotch Brownie Day.

holidays.title: National Christina Day
holidays.description: Every Christina in the world, are you ready to be celebrated on this day?

holidays.title: National Mini Golf Day
holidays.description: Get your putter and golf balls ready as we celebrate the fascinating game of mini-golf.

holidays.title: National Moscato Day
holidays.description: Today's your chance to raise a glass and celebrate the history of this tasty white wine.

holidays.title: National Sleepover Day
holidays.description: Gather all your besties because it’s time for pillow fights and gossip!

holidays.title: National Train Day
holidays.description: Trains, which are always fascinating, are now one of the most eco-friendly modes of transport.

holidays.title: National Windmill Day
holidays.description: Let's learn the origins of windmills and their role in shaping industries.

holidays.title: O. Henry Pun-off Day
holidays.description: Puns, wordplay, and wit — the perfect combination in O. Henry’s literary works!

holidays.title: Russian Victory Day
holidays.description: This Russian Victory Day, let us honor and remember the courage of eight million Russians.

holidays.title: Stamp Out Hunger Food Drive Day
holidays.description: Learn about poverty and how you can get involved in feeding the hungry.

holidays.title: Stay Up All Night Day
holidays.description: Stay up doing fun activities to celebrate Stay Up All Night Day in style.

holidays.title: Tear the Tags Off The Mattress Day
holidays.description: Remove as many tags as you want! Do not miss out on this quirky celebration.

holidays.title: World Belly Dance Day
holidays.description: Explore the origins, evolution, and how best to enjoy belly dancing for fun exercise.

holidays.title: World Buckfast Day
holidays.description: Do not miss out on celebrating this fantastic day, but be ready to get a hangover!

holidays.title: Billy Joel’s Birthday
holidays.description: Let's honor this multi-award winner who stands out in every aspect of his musical career.

holidays.title: Kelsey Animated’s Birthday
holidays.description: For this young animator, this is just the beginning of her stardom.

holidays.title: Noah Centineo’s Birthday
holidays.description: He is quickly becoming an overnight star and everyone wants to know about Noah Centineo!
